definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: pleasant, delightful (poet.);—abs. ´[[נ]] Pr 22:18 +; cstr. [[נְעִים]] 2Sa 23:1 pl. [[נְעִמִים]] Ps 16:6, [[נְעִימִם]] 2Sa 1:23, [[נְעִימִים]] Pr 23:8; f. [[נְעִמוֹת]] Ps 16:11; —

delightful [[בְּחַיֵּיהֶם]] ´[[הַנֶּאֱהָבִים וְהַנּ]] 2Sa 1:23 (of Saul and Jonath.); of wealth, ´[[הוֹן יׇקָר וְנ]] Pr 24:4; words Pr 23:8; of acts, etc.: ´[[מַה־טּוֹב וּמַה־נּ]] [[שֶׁבֶת אַחִים גַּם־יׇחַָד]] Ps 133:1; singing praises to ´[[י]], Ps 135:3, Ps 147:1; keeping wise teachings Pr 22:18; as subst. = delight [[יְכַלּוּ יְמֵיהֶם בַּטּוֹב וּשְׁנֵיהֶם בַּנְּעִימִים]] Job 36:11 (of earthly prosperity); of spiritual delights Ps 16:6, Ps 16:11.
lovely, beautiful (physically), Ct So 1:16 (‖[[יׇפֶה]]).—Ps 81:3, 2Sa 23:1 v. II. [[נׇעִים]] sub II. [[נעם]].
